steps.text: Clean the new external composite surface with approved cleaners to remove all mold release materials.
Sand the old or new gelcoat to remove surface imperfections using a DA sander and 3M Hookit 775L Cubitron II abrasive discs, grade 80+.
Apply dry guide coat to the surface and re-sand to ensure an even texture.
Clean the repair area with approved cleaner or blow off using pressured air.
Mix and apply 3M™ Marine Blister Repair Filler, filling 85% of the cavity.
Wait 30 minutes.
Feather the repair with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron² II abrasive disc, grade 80+.
Apply dry guide coat and re-sand.
Mix and apply 3M™ Marine Premium Filler.
After filler has cured, sand with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron² II abrasive discs.
Finally, sand the repair area with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron² II grade 220+.
Ensure surface is dry and mask areas with 3M™ Precision Masking Tape followed by 3M™ Performance Industrial Masking Tape.
Apply 3M™ Purple Premium Plus Masking Film to the entire surface.
Mix gelcoat in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 disposable spray cup.
Adjust settings on 3M™ Performance Spray Gun.
Hold spray gun 15cm-20cm from the surface and apply gelcoat.
Clean the new external composite surface with approved cleaner.
Sand with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II 320+ and then 400+ grade abrasives using a Soft Interface Pad.
If the surface is in good condition, sand with P800 grade 3M™ Hookit™ Flexible Abrasive Foam Discs.
Refine the P800 grade sand scratch using P1200 grade 3M™ Hookit™ Flexible Abrasive Foam Discs.
Compound the surface with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Gelcoat Heavy Cutting Compound and a 3M™ Perfect-It™ Low Linting Wool Compounding Pad.
Use a Rotary Polishing machine at 1400-1800 rpm.
Clean the surface using the same 6-step process.
Sand the surface following the 6-step process.
Refine scratches through sanding.
Compound the surface with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Gelcoat Compound + Polish and a 3M™ Perfect-It™ Low Linting Wool Compounding Pad.
Use a Rotary Polishing machine at 1400-1800 rpm for polishing.
Apply 3M™ Perfect-It™ Boat Wax to a 10cm x 10cm area and wipe clean before it dries.
Clean the surface with approved cleaner.
Sand the surface using a DA sander and 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron™ II 80+ grade abrasive discs.
Apply 3M™ Marine Premium Filler.
After it sets, apply dry guide coat and sand with 120+ grade.
Finish sanding with 220+ grade.
Clean the surface.
Ensure the surface is dry.
Apply masking tapes and film.
Mix primer in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cup.
Apply primer with a 3M™ Performance Spray Gun.
Apply dry guide coat and sand the primer with 320+ grade abrasive discs.
Repeat sanding with 400+ grade.
Clean the surface.
Mix marine paint in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cup.
Apply marine paint with a 3M™ Performance Spray Gun.
Clean the surface with approved cleaner.
Sand the surface with 3M™ Hookit™ Purple Finishing Film Disc 260L+ P1200/1500 grade using a DA sander and soft interface pad (Dry option).
Alternatively, sand the surface with 3M™ Trizact™ Hookit™ Clear Coat Sanding Disc grade 1500 using a DA sander and soft interface pad and a light mist of water (Wet option).
Refine any remaining scratches with 3M™ Hookit™ Flexible Abrasive Foam Disc P2000 grade (Dry option).
Alternatively, refine any remaining scratches with 3M™ Trizact™ Hookit™ Foam Abrasive Disc 443SA grade 3000 using a light mist of water (Wet option).
Clean the surface.
Use an approved cleaner.
Clean the surface before compounding.
Compound with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Fast Cut Plus Extreme and a 3M™ wool or green foam compounding pad.
Use a rotary polisher at 1400-1800 rpm.
Polish the surface with 3M™ Perfect-It™ Ultrafina SE Polish and a 3M™ wool or blue foam polishing pad at 1400-1800 rpm.
Apply 3M™ Perfect-It™ Boat Wax to a 10cm x 10cm area and wipe clean before it dries.
Sand the bottom surface using a dual-action sander with 3M™ Hookit™ 775L Cubitron² II 220+ grade abrasive. Clean the area.
Mix and apply 3M™ Marine Premium Filler. After it cures, sand with 120+ grade abrasive, then finish with 220+ grade.
Ensure the surface is dry. Apply masking tapes and film.
Mix bottom paint in a 3M™ PPS™ Series 2.0 cup.
Remove lid filter.
Use a 3M™ Performance Spray Gun.
Hold spray gun 15cm-20cm from surface.

entities.content: Approved cleaners: 3M Perfect-It Boat Wash, 3M Perfect-It High Performance Cloth
